entry.title: semaver
entry.content:
ah, ulan dede
yalnız temizlen diye
bin dereden su getirdim ve
bir tas suda boğdum seni.

tavşan gibi koştum
kanı, yıldız tozu güllerle.
çay oldum, demlendim de
içseydik dede gölgelerle!

ah, ulan dede
yalnız binbir tavşan kanı
çay içseydik ya
içseydik be şu gölgede.

ah, ulan dede
yalnız
çay
içseydik be.

entry.title: pregnant
entry.content:
drawing curtains
hiding fetus
behind venus
all Night long
let it flow
into snow
crystals in a row
mothers will bow
and swallow
their unborn babies!

entry.title: blind
entry.content:
I encouraged slavery
against firefly’s bravery
her light’s a cheap delivery
Dark murders the scenery

I bribed the sun
to bring the dawn
she’s crowned, no longer a pawn
yet torn apart, no longer one

I fooled the moon
not to wake up soon
behind my Eyes, her doom
a dream, at the brightest noon

above the shoulders of flowers
the questions planted answers
just what dissuaded the brightness
from filling my eyes with tears?
